Name: Eid
description:
Eid is a 39-year-old married Palestinian refugee living in Lebanon. He is a hardworking and devoted father of six children whom he loves and takes very good care of.

Eid has worked as a tractor driver since 2013. He also works in the agriculture domain as a daily laborer to provide for his family.

He is acquiring this loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to buy beehives and the necessary machinery for starting his own honey business.

He hopes that he will be able to expand his business and get the best out of his skills and available resources.
